487390.name: System Shock Demo
487390.description:
After two decades, Nightdive Studios is rebooting and re-imagining the original System Shock. We will keep the new game true to the classic experience, keeping all the things you loved while giving today's gamers the modern look and feel expected from a AAA title.

If you enjoyed the demo please consider adding System Shock to your wish list and backing our project on Backerkit!



This pre-alpha demo features the entire Medical Deck level and a small sample of enemies and weapons from the final game. This is a work in progress and not final, there are many features still in development.

We look forward to hearing your feedback on the forums!
487390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
